description: WEIS ICE CREAM HALF & HALF MANGO & VANILLA 1 LTRWEIS HALF AND HALF, 1L, a delicious frozen combination of refreshing Mango Sorbet and  Vanilla Ice Cream in a  tub. The best of two worlds! Weis have taken inspiration from our famous two-tone bars and created a 1L Tub to delight the senses. Australian mangoes to create our famous sorbet - nothing to tricky just great taste with our decadent smooth vanilla ice cream to round it off, all you have to do is enjoy! We also have two other delicious flavours in the Weis Half and Half range, so give these ice cream tubs a try too. Great for sneaky spoonfuls or family gatherings or simply an after dinner dessert treat, real fruit and real dairy, made the Weis way. At Weis, our products are based on recipes, so the focus is on the subtle blending of real ingredients and ultimately the taste. Our knowledge and expertise in sourcing and working with all different kinds of fruits, premium grade nuts and natural ingredients enables us to create unique combinations and taste experiences. Made in Australia since 1957. Visit our website to find our more about our full range of exciting flavours and our farm to freezer story.Delicious combination of refreshing Mango Sorbet with the smoothest Vanilla Ice cream.Real Fruit and Real Dairy, bringing the best of both worlds together in a frozen ice cream tub.We pride ourselves on using quality ingredients that contain no artificial flavours and are Gluten FreeLight fruit Indulgence, so treat yourself!Delicious 1L sorbet & ice cream tub, perfect for family and friend dessert occasions.Weis, made in Australia since 1957. Our famous two-tone now in a tub!
name: Weis Half & Half Mango & Vanilla Icecream 1l
